short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for journalists and writers to create backups of their work published on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a changing media landscape, closing outlets can't be relied on to keep up their journalism for posterity. This poses a problem for journalists who live and die (and get hired and promoted) based on their publishing record.

Story Safe is a simple tool (60 seconds to setup) that allows journalists to keep a record of all their published stories. It's a backup, an insurance policy, peace of mind. And it's free.

Features:

* Periodically capture your newest articles from your author page
* Track your publishing record on your personal dashboard
* Benchmark yourself against journalists at your outlets and others

Supported outlets:

* Business Insider
* Vice (coming soon)
* NYT (coming soon)
* The Guardian (coming soon)

More outlets added by request. Request an outlet here: https://mystorysafe.com/request-an-outlet
